website_summaries.verdict: These are the official wheels from Nintendo, so you know you can trust them to work with your Switch.
pros: Includes 2 wheels and features soft-touch plastic that is comfortable to hold
Makes Mario Kart and other racing games for the Switch even more fun to play
cons: Still a bit small for adult hands

customer_reviews.title: Fun with Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: As described. Make sure that you know that they is relatively small for adult hands. Also, a couple reviews complain about the top buttons being hard to press, I had this problem one of the times I inserted the joycons. You have to put them in somewhat carefully so that the button on the steering wheel is centered on the button, not to the left or right. My kids love to use this with Mario Kart. Makes the experience much more fun for a minimal cost.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sticking to Nintendo products on wheels
customer_reviews.text: Learned my lesson buying knock off wheels. In my defense the Nintendo wheels weren't released yet when buying the other types. I'm hoping we don't break the triggers like the other ones we have. I have 4 of these wheels now and they fit my 5 year old hands well and ours too. He plays almost every night for a little bit as a reward.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Inc

customer_reviews.title: "Wheely" good!
customer_reviews.text: If you have Mario Kart for the Switch, these are a necessity. They are super tiny, but gives you a bit more feel for the driving factor. To me, playing Mario Kart with just the little joy cons was a bit weird, so these really help.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Small, really light weight
customer_reviews.text: These wheels are much smaller than their Wii counterparts. Understandable since the controllers on the Switch are smaller than a Wii nunchuck. However, this makes it a little weird to hold in your hands. They're very light and I feel if they were weighted down a tad bit, it'd make steering with them a little easier. It's a bit hard to control your swerving with these but obviously they make the game more fun by pretending you're steering. Getting these in a two pack is a must, never know when you'll have a friend who wants to play and there are two controllers on the Switch by default!
customer_reviews.author: sqwirk

customer_reviews.title: Buttons Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: The buttons on the top don't fully depress the buttons on the actual remote consistently. One of them, I can't get to press the button at all, on a brand new remote. The design is faulty IMHO. The underside of the top buttons are too large and hit the casing of the remote that's inserted, so it doesn't always depress the button. The slide on wrist straps that come with the remotes are a better design because the top buttons have a smaller point to depress the buttons and don't hit on the remote casing. Those work fine, but these steering wheel remotes just don't.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Improves game play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids for Mario cart. The wheels came well packaged and und undamaged. The box was as shown and the wheels were well packaged inside. The colors of the wheels are a neat black that complements the switch controllers. They are smaller than I expected, I am use to the wii wheels size but the small size makes sense for the switch. It’s triggers do not stick and are easy to press. The controllers sit snug inside and do not slip out during game play. It’s easier to play racing games with the wheels since switch controllers are so small. It was a great buy for a great system.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gill

customer_reviews.title: cheap plastic accessories that work
customer_reviews.text: these are cheap plastic accessories so you can put the switch controllers and play Mario kart in a slightly more immersive way. they're fine. my kids like them. before, they wouldn't play Mario kart, but after I got them, they were much more interested, so I'm happy with the purchase. since then, they're learned how to play with the remotes and dont use these wheels anymore. they did what I needed them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Two Shoes

customer_reviews.title: exactly right ...
customer_reviews.text: ... glad to have them in black to match our Switch. I wish the Switch had come in purple & orange - my guy has a phone case, headphones, bluetooth speaker and pro•controller in orange & black. I have a phone case, headphones, bluetooth speaker and pro•controller in purple & black - well, my pro•controller is purple & white ... We will likely get the purple & orange joycons soon•ish ... but our Switch, steerling wheels, joycons are all black & gray ...
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Noël

customer_reviews.title: must have for mario kart!
customer_reviews.text: The first game we purchased with our Nintendo Switch was Mario Kart, basically a must have game for any of the Nintendo systems in the past and future. While you could obviously play Mario Kart with the Switch controllers 'as is,' using the wheel accessories are fun for younger players and also gives you a more 'substantive' grip as compared to handling just the little controller by itself. We have 4 wheels and they're always in use.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: If you only have one set of joycons, these are perfect for Mario Kart. Really help with the motion controls and doesn't cramp your hands. Some people may have issues with the shoulder buttons on the wheel, mainly the amount of travel they have before hitting the buttons on the joycon. I didn't have any problems, but if its too much you can check out some guides on Youtube to make that a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mario Kart!
customer_reviews.text: For just a few extra bucks you can get these Nintendo original products. I almost got a set of generic wheel grips but then I saw these for just a few dollars more. So glad I got them. They work PERFECTLY. Playing Mario Kart has never been more fun. The wheels fit the joycons perfectly and are very well built. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher V

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions on how to insert the Joy-Con properly otherwise the shoulder buttons won't work!
customer_reviews.text: These are super tiny compared to the Wii wheel but they do add a bit of much needed size/weight to the tiny Joy-Cons, and kids really like using them. Make sure you line up the + or - sign on the Joy-Con with the one on the wheel - DO NOT CENTER THEM IN THE WHEEL - otherwise the L and R buttons won't function properly or at all. We didn't figure this out until after a few races.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: works with the supplied switch controllers
customer_reviews.text: If you liked the wheel for Mario kart then you will like these. They are a little smaller but you will find it easier to use the controller like a steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Toddler-sized hands are a must
customer_reviews.text: These are WAY too small to be useful for adult hands. If you have one of the wheels for the Wiimote, these are half that size, and are so much more awkward. After trying to play Mario Kart with these wheels, my marriage suffered, my crops wilted, and my dog ran away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garner

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need these
customer_reviews.text: The description is not clear that the “steering wheel” does not actually control in-game movement with a traditional steering motion. The overall size is small and not suitable for an average adult-sized hand. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Van

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Makes the joycon much easier to use. I’ve only used it with Mario kart but it’s great! I have large hands so now I refuse to play without these. They do feel kind of cheap. In hindsight I probably would have gone with something like amazons brand.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Latham

customer_reviews.title: Easy for young children
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing mario kart and this made it much easier for them to understand and control (4 and 5 year old)
customer_reviews.author: Jean P

customer_reviews.title: Is it gimmickry if it works?
customer_reviews.text: makes Mario Cart very enjoyable. I started by playing with just the joy-cons, and Mario Cart was disappointing, not very fun. Then I got these wheels... they look gimmicky but they work great. Mario cart is now very fun to play. I am quite surprised that these wheels really work at improving the steering.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Too small, but still better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: My husband has large hands and he dislikes how small these are compared to the Wii wheels. They are very tiny! However, he says that they are still much better than using nothing at all because the buttons are easier to press when racing in Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two Sets for Parties
customer_reviews.text: These work great! They are pretty small for my hands (but that's the joycon's fault, not these). The Trigger buttons are both responsive and provide good tactile feedback when the button is pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Welch

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller controllers than I expected. They are the size of the joy con, which is small for adult hands. The size is probably fine for smaller kids. The construction is very good and the buttons connect well to the hoy con buttons.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Good product- keep reasonable expectations
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Smaller than most gaming steering wheels. These are similar to the size of a dessert plate. If you are wanting something for larger adult hands to make the controller much more comfy these will only.do that a bit. The hold the controller well and work so not complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Environmental Initiaitves of North America

customer_reviews.title: Tinty
customer_reviews.text: These things are tiny. The whole reason I bought them was so the tiny joy-cons would be less tiny. These do not achieve that, but I didn't look at the dimensions before I bought them so I'm going to take the L on this one. 4 stars because they are what they say they are.
customer_reviews.author: pencek

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I had to figure out the controls it is what it is i prefer the wheel over using the controller alone. It's small compared to my wii wheel but it doesn't bother me my hands aren't big anyway. I noticed no difference with controlling my handling from the Wii wheel to this one i jumped right in with no problems i can still hit those corners close. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Miz P

customer_reviews.title: Great joy con wheel for 14.99
customer_reviews.text: For under $15 can't go wrong with the genuine Nintendo joy con wheel especially for Mario Kart 8. Only $14.99. My advice is don't pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Yaga321

customer_reviews.title: Small but they work great!
customer_reviews.text: We played Mario kart on the Wii with the Wii wheels for years! Mario kart 8 for the switch is a way better game but playing with one joy con wasn’t really cutting it with how crammed your hands are to hold it right wanting access to all buttons. These made playing with one joy con each actually fun again! Much Smaller than the Wii wheels -which means they take up less space in our entertainment center but also have less surface area to hold, so turns with these are tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Normalguy89

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers, not so much for adults.
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY small, but perfect for my 4yr old to play Mario Kart. And good quality, cuz they can withstand toddler force (2 and 4 yr olds). Lol
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hott

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my LO Nintendo switch, makes playing Mario Kart, that much more fun. Response is the same as using just the remote itself. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Mainly for children
customer_reviews.text: These are small and will fit a child’s hands at most.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Coakley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves these controllers. Makes him want to play more and more with the big kids. These are solid enough that they should last a long time. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, fits well
customer_reviews.text: These are a little small for bigger hands, but for children or smaller hands it is just fine. The controllers fit in great and the wheels work just fine on Mario Kart Racing.
customer_reviews.author: Relle

customer_reviews.title: Fun for children
customer_reviews.text: These are great for little kids... probably not going to be real helpful for trying to play the game better. I bought it specifically to play with some 6 year olds... happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TFO

customer_reviews.title: Feels like driving a normal car.
customer_reviews.text: Are you training your child to drive for the first time? These wheels might help. Mario Kart is a life like driving simulation complete with real world obstacles like red shells and bananas. These wheels help make Mario Kart feel like real world driving, which is great for any nervous parent with a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: My son realy wanted a stearing wheel for his switch but could not get it working properly. Eventually got single player working but havn't been able to race multi-player.
customer_reviews.author: Emilystrange2

customer_reviews.title: Non-Nintendo Brand Wheel Received
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately received a non-Nintendo brand joy-con wheel, despite the listing being for the OEM wheel. Had to return since the item was incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but small for adult hands.
customer_reviews.text: These add a fun new element to gameplay, but like other reviews say, they can be tricky to align the buttons and are pretty small for adult size hands.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Makes your MarioKart experience feel more authentic and is way more fun for kids. Fits the joycons perfectly and securely. Not cheaply made. Durable even with toddlers using them.
customer_reviews.author: Rey D.

customer_reviews.title: They do what they're intended to but they're unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: These do what they're intended to do just fine but it's actually easier to play Mario Kart on the switch without them in my opinion. The joystick works much better.
customer_reviews.author: AllergyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, its easier for both adults and kids to just hold the controllers over using this add-on. It's very good, but I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Husbands likes them. No complaints for what they are--a plastic piece to make you feel more like driving. (No, the wheel doesn't actually control anything in the game).
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these wheels for racing and the whole family loves them! It took a few days to get used to how to insert them properly, but there are pictures and icons on the wheel to help you, so it's not difficult. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Abby Flannery

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift from Santa and well received. Great for little hands. My husband didn't care much for this, so I'd recommend for children.
customer_reviews.author: NYCutie

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised, But....
customer_reviews.text: As with all Switch accessories, the constant switching of these aftermarket items from one control layout to the next is somewhat tedious.
customer_reviews.author: nullus

customer_reviews.title: Pointless to have.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the purpose of these are. You can put the controls inside of them but turning the wheel doesn't do anything and pushing the buttons on them is useless. They are more a hindrance than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: set of two and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: these are must haves for anyone that loves to play driving games. they make it really easy to play and a lot of fun to challenge the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy ray

customer_reviews.title: Small but great
customer_reviews.text: Very small yet very light and great grip. And must if you are in for a more fun version of Mario kart. There is two shoulder buttonsnonnthe back of the wheel vs the one button on the Wii wheel. Makes for easy sharp turns.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The trigger buttons have major issues
customer_reviews.text: Thought these would be great for my son and I. Turns out the trigger buttons on the back are terrible and rarely actually work while playing games. Will be returning the ones we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These little wheels make Mario Kart 8 fun ! Just pop the joycon in and you're off to the races ! Works great! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for racing games!
customer_reviews.text: These help so much when playing racing games. They are small to hold, but the controllers themselves are small to begin with. My kids love using them to play Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.author: Becca S.

customer_reviews.title: must have for mario kart?
customer_reviews.text: they seem kinda flimsy but what else can you use for a wheel? they make mario kart more fun kinda wish they were bigger or grippier or somthign
customer_reviews.author: Emma Pond

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure these would be great
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these would be great, but they don't work for any of the driving games we currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Milton

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, frustrating trigger buttons
customer_reviews.text: Great fun to use and excellent at helping my newbie girlfriend learn how to play Mario kart. The trigger buttons require a bit of force and give almost zero feedback, which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Thinkpadius

customer_reviews.title: Not really necessary
customer_reviews.text: Fits fine but has zero impact on actual game play, controller just plugs into it so not really a necessary purchase
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands!
customer_reviews.text: The switch was a present for the kids and these were a nice addition for Mario cart. Lets them feel like they are actually driving the cars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved to play against each other with this two
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: we've been using these for over 7 months now and they are still going strong....holding up very well, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MajesticMountain

customer_reviews.title: Worth it get them
customer_reviews.text: Very glad we got this official product to go along with the cheap ones. Definitely worth the few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Small but they work perfectly for keeping your go cart or car in line on the track.
customer_reviews.text: Great edition to a super fun system. They are small but they give you great coordination on the race track. They really helped my seven year old grandson get the hang of steering.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger for people with bigger hands, but I guessing it's small for it to be more portable
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Prefer using controller alone
customer_reviews.text: To me it just made it harder to play Mario Kart compared to a full controller. Might be decent in travel situations where you only have 1 controller that you want to split. Cheap enough to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Sath

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick. Arrived on time for my long trip to Florida. Kids used them while we vacationed and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel G.

customer_reviews.title: they work as described, no flaws from what i can discern
customer_reviews.text: these are as you'd expect them to be, they make pressing the side buttons on the joy cons so much easier to press, unlike the pdp 'pro player' versions that... are flawed simply put. great for mario cart 8 and other racing games.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Important

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Mario Kart.
customer_reviews.text: They’re smaller than I anticipated but they work. Makes holding the joy con easier.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea but causes hand cramping.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great in theory and I’m sure they work well for smaller hands. But for adult hands you can’t grip them easily. I prefer turning with the joy con stick rather than actually physically moving it. Better off getting a different Joy con holder.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, my daughter has dropped them a few times no cracks or issues with putting the controller in them. A great addition to your accessories.
customer_reviews.author: OL1VEB0MB

customer_reviews.title: Makes Mario Kart easier and more fun
customer_reviews.text: Got these for playing Mario Kart on Nintendo switch. They make it a lot easier and a lot more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Irish4TW

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: Besides being kind of small they work as designed. They are made of plastic and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead 1103

customer_reviews.title: Know exactly what game it works with. Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not for all gamers. My Grandsons have ALL the games out there but not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Leapbaby

customer_reviews.title: mario cart 2.0
customer_reviews.text: This was more of a fun addition. works as intended. the joy cons slide easily in and out of place with minimal effort, but sturdy enough to stay put while "driving" a virtual go-cart. This is like the tennis racket for Mario tennis, just adds to the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and very light
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, but as someone who does enjoy playing Nintendo every once in a while with the kids (brings back the kid in me), these were super light weight and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleH

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I play Mario Kart with my kids and I love using the wheel. It makes the game more interactive. It is small but I have small hands so it's not an issue for me or the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Work Well
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what we wanted for our Nintendo Switch. Took an extra long time to arrive, but the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Small but well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love the steering wheel! Yes they may be a little small but they are amazing quality of course coming from Nintendo themselves and not some other third party bouncing off of them. Must buy if you have Mario cart for the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: but a perfect size for littler kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids have a blast playing mario cart on the switch with the steering wheels. They are small, but a perfect size for littler kids. I usually use the joystick as that is a bit more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Black

customer_reviews.title: These are super tiny.
customer_reviews.text: These are super tiny....which I guess I should have known given the size of the Switch controllers,and how they fit on the photo. I don't find these to add much value to the experience...just my $.02.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love using these
customer_reviews.text: Love using these to play Mario cart with my kid. Perfect for racing games
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kiddo and playing Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kiddo and playing Mario Kart. Just wish they were bit larger for the adults in the house, but still an improvement over just the Joy-Con.
customer_reviews.author: Allkair

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and a lot of fun to play Mario kit with. They are a but small and I would recommend getting the better and larger Mario and Luigi steering wheels also found on Amazon. They are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffins&Nubbalicious

customer_reviews.title: didn't expect...
customer_reviews.text: didn't expect to be so small, but it was a gift to my nephew, product came on time..
customer_reviews.author: Chimeripina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes holding the Switch remote much easier. Buttons are easier to push as well. It's cheap and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Dat Boi Avlan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These work Great! I purchased 4 and we use them every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ysmartinez

customer_reviews.title: Gets you more into the game for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I felt as if the wheels could be a bit bigger but it does make Mario kart a lot more fun! My girlfriend didn’t really like it though as she was horrible at it but I was doing great!
customer_reviews.author: kaos khan

customer_reviews.title: I only wish they were a bit bigger like the wiimote variety
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Works well for my daughter and I when we race on Mario Kart. I only wish they were a bit bigger like the wiimote variety, but they work as expected
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mac

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition, but forgettable
customer_reviews.text: It's great to use your JoyCon with kids, but can be a bit cumbersome to use and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E Black

customer_reviews.title: bad buttons and bad design
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality SL SR rear buttons do not work what so ever. I have tried multiple times to align the buttons "properly" as some have stated in the reviews but this still did not work. They are also way to small only a 5 year old could use these. Disappointing for Nintendo to put out such a bad quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sir_Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Sometime joy con don't engage well and need a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometime joy con don't engage well and need a bit of work to make it fit perfect. They are really small but my song love play mario kart with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cuesta Jorge S.

customer_reviews.title: They are not big like the regular wii wheels but they make playing the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than they are at our Gamestop! Worth it! They are not big like the regular wii wheels but they make playing the driving games easier!
customer_reviews.author: JesButter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made the Mario kart experience a lot better with this. These are very small wheels, so wrist might get tired after a few rounds for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Definitely use the Nintendo brand!
customer_reviews.text: Tried off brand before and they were terrible. Use these. Good for all games (not just driving). These really help you hold those small controllers.
customer_reviews.author: dijitz

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but makes it MUCH easier to play Mario kart!
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Biermann

customer_reviews.title: On the small side
customer_reviews.text: A fun addition to Mario Kart 8 on the Switch. They're on the small side though, better for childrens' hands than adults. Need to adjust settings to allow movement control, rather than joystick, in the game. This wasn't obvious in the limited documentation.
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Good for young kids, not real play.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my young child. He likes them, but if you want to play seriously don't spend the money. You get far better control with the joy stick.
customer_reviews.author: river

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with joy cons
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with the joy-cons as expected since it's the official nintendo wheel! Comfortable to hold and play mario cart.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Piotrowski

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to use as well
customer_reviews.text: Controllers fit perfectly and the triggers always work. Very comfortable to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: One of the controllers the two top buttons will not press.
customer_reviews.author: Amaia

customer_reviews.title: These do make the compatable game better to play and give them new life
customer_reviews.text: These do make the compatable game better to play and give them new life, however, I would like to have a most realist stering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product that makes family game night even more fun!
customer_reviews.author: prachnis

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Hardly work and every other wheel the back triggers get funny and will stop responding. Great idea just does not function
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for small hands. Easy slip in for joy con.
customer_reviews.author: A Hale

customer_reviews.title: Good product to go with a Nintendo switch
customer_reviews.text: This was a good christmas gift for my son who has a Nintendo switch.
customer_reviews.author: Camelle Wilson

product_meta.title: Nintendo Joy-Con Wheel (Set of 2) - Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Color:BlackInsert a Joy‑Con into this accessory to feel like you're behind the wheel in your favorite racing game. Joy‑Con controllers not included.
feature_bullets: Insert a Joy‑Con into this accessory to feel like you're behind the wheel in your favorite racing game.
